name: The Lodge (itch) (AnomalousGames)
description:
...Is a Short puzzle game in which you go on a hiking trip with no tent on you. you must find shelter and survive it as well.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Story

It's Raining I must find somewhere to stay. I feel great pressure.  I have to leave but the door is locked I must find a way. I'm slowly Losing My$eIf. 

Get.

Me.

Out.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Gameplay The Lodge is a first-person horror puzzle game where your goal is to escape the strange house you decide to enter. You must complete the puzzles which it made for you to survive and Get Out. USE THE AXE TO BREAK DOORS!
